text: Giro (Kiro) Manoyan () is an Armenian politician, one of the leaders of ARF Dashnaktsutiun and the head of Armenian Cause Office.Giro Manoyan Lectures on Armenian Cause at Haigazian University, by M. Yardemian, The Armenian Reporter, 11-26-2005 Manoyan attended and finished Concordia University in Montreal, Canada. In the 1980s he was the Executive Director of the Armenian National Committee of Canada. From 1989 to 1999, he edited the Horizon Weekly Armenian newspaper. Since 2000, he is the Director of the International Secretariat of the Armenian Revolutionary Federation Bureau in Yerevan. == References == ==Other websites== * An interview with Kiro Manoyan Category:Armenian politicians Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:People from Beirut Category:21st-century Armenian people Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Giro Manoyan
